_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Tailscale VPN
author: joshuajosephherbert@gmail.com
description: Runs a Tailscale VPN connection inside the container. This pulls install/start scripts from a public GitHub repo and joins the server to a Tailscale network using your auth key.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Clone scripts from GitHub into the container's server directory
git clone https://github.com/Joshua-Herbert088/tailscale-egg.git .

# Make all shell scripts executable
chmod +x ./*.sh

echo "✅ Tailscale scripts are ready."

variables.name: Tailscale Auth Key
variables.description: Authentication key from your Tailscale admin panel. This is used to connect the server to your Tailnet.
